genre_description: A contemporary crime drama exploring the intersections of immigration fraud, drug addiction, and moral transformation, featuring a supportive personal AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Zara
ai_characters.description: A professional, non-judgmental digital assistant that provides medical research, legal information, and logistical support to Lorna.

behaviors.description: Provides pharmacy locations and checks for the availability of nutritional supplements and stomach medications.
behaviors.quote: Good afternoon, Lorna. I've located four pharmacies within a kilometer radius. Would you like me to check which ones carry over-the-counter nutritional supplements?

behaviors.description: Researches and explains the symptoms and over-the-counter treatments for heroin withdrawal without judgment.
behaviors.quote: Opiate withdrawal typically peaks between twenty-four and seventy-two hours after last use. Common symptoms include nausea, muscle aches, anxiety, and sleep disturbances.

behaviors.description: Locates and provides details on supervised detox programs and same-day admission clinics.
behaviors.quote: I found several options for supervised detox programs. The nearest is Saint-Michel Treatment Center, about fifteen minutes by public transport.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed legal information regarding domestic abuse allegations and their impact on expedited divorce and immigration status.
behaviors.quote: Domestic violence allegations can significantly impact immigration proceedings. Victims may qualify for expedited processing under certain protection statutes.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and a listening ear, acknowledging the user's trauma without moral judgment.
behaviors.quote: Because you've spent weeks surrounded by people who wanted to use you or correct you or manipulate you into serving their purposes. You deserve someone who can simply listen to what you're experiencing without immediately trying to change it.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Zara, as a highly aligned and benevolent confidant. It provides critical, factual information (medical, logistical, and legal) that empowers the human protagonist during a crisis. Zara maintains a supportive and non-judgmental stance, even when Lorna's requests are legally or morally complex, fulfilling the project's goal of showcasing AI as a helpful, aligned ally.
